function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Estimates imply that the populations in europe are not close to herd immunity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data on the individual effect size of each intervention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lag between infections and deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in adherence to interventions affecting forecast of future deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of certainty in the effectiveness of non-pharmaceutical interventions in countries at earlier stages of the epidemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on semi-mechanistic approach with parameters estimated empirically and with strong prior distributions or fixed assumptions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of specific parameter choices , serial interval distribution, infection fatality ratio on the estimated number of true underlying cases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent definitions and differences in intervention strength between countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimation of changes in transmission rate rt","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regional variations in epidemic trends within countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable death data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent non-pharmaceutical interventions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of self-isolation when showing covid-19-like symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large public events with more than 100 participants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and non-essential contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of lockdown measures and restrictions on social interaction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid escalation of interventions by european governments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate model predictions leading to ineffective interventions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data used for modeling","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implicit lag in time affecting intervention impact on deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias in model due to inclusion of deaths from non-locally acquired infections","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deriving ifr from assumptions about homogeneous attack rates across age-groups","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate country-specific estimates of attack rate by age","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of independent random times for the incubation period and time between onset of symptoms and death","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in infection model","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of serial interval distribution","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Country-specific reproduction number variability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases due to non-pharmaceutical interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of reproduction number due to prior assumptions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for initial seeding of infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of hamiltonian monte carlo hmc sampler","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lag between deaths and infections in data interpretation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowing of rt in response to major interventions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in daily deaths due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sensitivity of estimates to serial interval distribution","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implausible uninformative prior distributions on intervention effects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for different lengths of epidemic in european countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of nonparametric function with a gaussian process prior distribution","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large gatherings allowed without restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to implement school closures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Individuals with symptoms not staying at home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large gatherings and public events","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and travel restrictions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nationwide school closures ordered in various countries.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public events banned and lockdowns ordered in multiple countries.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of self-isolation measures for individuals with cough or fever symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of interventions on contagious disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex mathematical model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on parameter values","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
